Common font pairings by use case

uniqueCharacteristics.commit: Fixed decorative sidebar with glow effects, starfield animation
uniqueCharacteristics.compass: Video-based learning platform, course module structure
uniqueCharacteristics.pocket: Mobile app showcase with phone mockups, animated circles
uniqueCharacteristics.primer: Book/course landing page with table of contents
uniqueCharacteristics.radiant: Modern SaaS design with bento grid layout, bold gradients
uniqueCharacteristics.salient: Classic SaaS marketing with pricing comparison
uniqueCharacteristics.spotlight: Personal portfolio with blog focus, ring effects
uniqueCharacteristics.studio: Agency showcase with case studies, grayscale image transitions
uniqueCharacteristics.transmit: Podcast platform with persistent audio player

searchTools.reason: Full documentation tools return very large responses (320k-730k tokens). Search tools provide targeted results with smaller context.

fullDocs.caution: Only use with LLMs supporting 100k+ (Next.js) or 200k+ (Tailwind) token contexts
fullDocs.alternatives: Prefer search_nextjs_docs and search_tailwind_docs for most use cases

patterns.coverage: Architecture, visual design, components, colors, typography
